educations.description: Studied computer technology with hands-on experience in system setup, maintenance, networking, and basic software development, preparing for real-world IT and technical support roles.

Trained in electrical circuit design, electronics, power distribution, control systems, and troubleshooting through an Electrical Engineering program emphasizing practical and analytical problem-solving.

experiences.description: Supported IT operations by assisting with system maintenance, troubleshooting hardware and software issues, and contributing to day-to-day technical support activities.
Provided technical support to end users by diagnosing and resolving hardware, software, and network issues while ensuring reliable system operation and user satisfaction.
